original_text: Jesus offered himself as a sacrifice because of all the wrong things that we have done. He did that to save us from all the bad things of this world in which we live now. This is what God, our Father, wanted him to do.
korean_text: 그리스도께서 하나님 곧 우리 아버지의 뜻을 따라 이 악한 세대에서 우리를 건지시려고 우리 죄를 대속하기 위하여 자기 몸을 주셨으니

sentences.original_text: Jesus offered himself as a sacrifice
because of all the wrong things
He did that to save us
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 우리를 구원하기 위해 그렇게 하셨다

sentences.original_text: This is what God, our Father, wanted
sentences.korean_translation: 이것이 하나님 우리 아버지께서 원하신 것이다
